home.title: A Bestseller
home.subTitle: Discover the Renowned Orions
home.description1: Here follow the chronicles of the Orions as they have been passed down through generations. Be warned, for this story must not be forgotten. One day, light will once again battle darkness. Then those who have forgotten will have to pay the price.
home.description2: Centuries ago, when dragons were still tameable and mountains inhospitable, the Orions created the island of Nador. But when one of them, Rhena, sees the young world perish in a vision, the Orions are confronted with a future beyond even their powers. To save Nador, one of them must pay the ultimate price.

about.title: The Story of
about.subTitle: Unlock Your Mind
about.description1: Reading was instilled in me from a young age, first by my parents, who loved to read to me, and later by myself. Besides reading stories, I also absolutely love writing my own, especially fanfictions about my favorite books, series, and movies.
about.description2: I also wrote a book, Levensadem. It's a story about Orions who created and live on the island of Nador, but must use all their strength to prevent the world from ending. I also published this book in physical form, with the cover and illustrations created by Lions Art Page.
